import { useState, memo } from 'react' import './RegisterInformationRooms.scss' import { vietnamese, english } from '../../Languages/InputNameInformationService' import { vietnameseRoomType, englishRoomType } from '../../Languages/RoomType' import { TbCameraPlus } from 'react-icons/tb' function RegisterInformationRooms({ languageSelected }) { const [roomName, setRoomName] = useState('') const [roomType, setRoomType] = useState('') const [numberOfRoom, setNumberOfRoom] = useState(0) const [numberOfPeopleRoom, setNumberOfPeopleRoom] = useState(0) const [bedType, setBedType] = useState('') const [description, setDescriptions] = useState('') const [roomSize, setRoomSize] = useState(0) let languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese)[0][1] let roomTypeList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishRoomType : vietnameseRoomType) const handleBlur = (input) => { if (input.value != '') { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #4874E8' } else { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #D9D9D9' } } const handleFocus = (input) => { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #4874E8' } return (
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} onChange={(e) => setRoomName(e.target.value)} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='numberOfRoom' className="input-inline" type='number' onChange={(e) => setNumberOfRoom(e.target.value)} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='numberOfPeopleOnRoom' className="input-inline" type='number' onChange={(e) => setNumberOfPeopleRoom(e.target.value)} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='roomSize' className="input-inline" type='number' onChange={(e) => setRoomSize(e.target.value)} />
